title: Air pollution causes 8.8 million extra early deaths a year

title_detail.value: Air pollution causes 8.8 million extra early deaths a year

summary: Air pollution could be causing double the number of extra deaths a year in Europe than has been estimated previously, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Air pollution could be causing double the number of extra deaths a year in Europe than has been estimated previously, according to a new study.
